about_the_game:
The original soundtrack to the game DOOMBLADE.
DOOMBLADE’s hour-long soundtrack, composed by Brian Skeel, perfectly blends lush atmosphere and crushing aggression. In a game where innocence and vengeance make an unlikely pair, the music blurs the lines between organic instrumentation and synthetic sound design, reflecting an environment where ancient lands and advanced technology coexist.
